name: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition
desc: A specification for a metaparameter defined by a number.

items.name: init(value: Double)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a metaparameter with the given numeric value.

items.name: init(value: Double, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a named metaparameter with the given numeric value.

items.name: init(value: Double, minimum: Double, maximum: Double)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a metaparameter with the given numeric value and range.

items.name: init(value: Double, minimum: Double, maximum: Double, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a named metaparameter with the given numeric value and range.

items.name: var minimum: Double
items.desc: The lowest possible number for the value.

items.name: var maximum: Double
items.desc: The highest possible number for the value.
